text: 15.24 Jon 3.2, 7.31, 9.32, 9.41, 14.11 Yad apɨl kɨlop nab okok tap mageptek okok gɨnek, tap anɨb okok bɨ olap ned ma yɨbɨl gak agak. Anɨb ma gepɨnep, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak, takaw awl yɨbɨl ma dɨpɨlap agak. Mɨñɨl pen tap mageptek okok gen nɨŋɨd, yɨp mɨlɨk nepal Bapi nop abe mɨlɨk nepal agak.
